```{r load-packages, message = TRUE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(skimr)
```

```{r load-data, message = TRUE, eval = TRUE}
awards <- read_csv("data/awards.csv") 
```

```{r showdata, error=TRUE}
glimpse(awards)
```

```{r}
ggplot(awards, aes(x=award, color=pos))+
geom_bar()
```
